headline.main: US Stocks Slip Further From Record Highs as Banks Decline
headline.print_headline: US Stocks Slip Further From Record Highs as Banks Decline

lead_paragraph: U.S. stocks are falling for the second time in three day as banks return some of their recent gains. They surged last week as interest rates quickly rose. Mining and basic materials companies are down after China cut its economic growth forecast. Meat producer Tyson Foods is falling after avian flu was discovered at a supplier's farm.
